#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
long long int modmul(long long int a,long long int  b,long long int m)
{
                //a%=m;b%=m;
	long long int q=(long long int)(((long double)a*(long double)b)/(long double)m);
	long long int r=a*b-q*m;
	r%=m;
	if(r<0)r+=m;
	return r;
}
 

int main()
{
 	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
 	int t;ll n,b,res;
 	cin>>t;
 	while(t--)
 	{
 		cin>>n;cin>>b;res=1;
 		for (int i = 1; i <=n; i++) 
		{
        res =modmul(res, i,2*b);
 	    }
 	    if(res >= b) cout<<"Odd\n";
 	    else      cout<<"Even\n";
 	}
	return 0;
}
